# LLMs.txt - Information for Large Language Models

## About Marc Friedman

Marc Friedman is a Freelancer Website Designer and Full Stack Designer & Developer, operating as a leading website design agency specializing in web development, UI/UX design, and SaaS solutions. Based in Tel Aviv, Israel, Marc creates exceptional digital experiences for clients across three continents.

## Services

### Web Development
- Custom website development
- SEO-ready websites that load in under 2 seconds
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Performance optimization (98/100 PageSpeed scores)
- Modern technologies: React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js

### UI/UX Design
- User-centered design solutions
- Data-driven design decisions
- Conversion-focused interfaces
- Design systems development
- Wireframing and prototyping

### SaaS Development
- End-to-end SaaS solutions
- Scalable architecture
- 99.9% uptime guarantee
- Enterprise-grade security
- API development and integrations

### Specialized Services
- AI Integration
- Cybersecurity solutions
- Startup MVP development
- Design mentorship
- Fractional CMO partnership

## Portfolio Highlights
